attributes.action: Reward Job Centre reception Staff for being Polite to disabled customers
attributes.additional_details:
Some Job Centre Reception Staff  do not recognise the special needs of those customers with certain disabilities, and turn them away without understanding their needs.
Can Job Centres explain why the Bouncers/ Security Staff  on the doors at Job Centres do not get trained in Politeness?
Can the DWP  please employ "mystery shoppers" to visit Job Centres  posing as Incapacity Benefit claimants  and reward staff who treat those claimants with proper respect.   But  can the "mystery shoppers"  also  reccommend staff with a bad attitude  to be re-trained  or moved  to other jobs.
